segment_text: A kind of peace had endured for a century and people had forgotten what anything else was like.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: They would scarcely have known how to react had they discovered that a kind of war had finally come.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Certainly, Elias Lynn, Chief of the Bureau of Robotics, wasn't sure how he ought to react when _he_ finally found out.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: The Bureau of Robotics was headquartered in Cheyenne, in line with the century-old trend toward decentralization, and Lynn stared dubiously at the young Security officer from Washington who had brought the news.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Elias Lynn was a large man, almost charmingly homely, with pale blue eyes that bulged a bit.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Men weren't usually comfortable under the stare of those eyes, but the Security officer remained calm.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn decided that his first reaction ought to be incredulity. Hell, it _was_ incredulity!
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He just didn't believe it!
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He eased himself back in his chair and said, "How certain is the information?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: The Security officer, who had introduced himself as Ralph G. Breckenridge and had presented credentials to match, had the softness of youth about him; full lips, plump cheeks that flushed easily, and guileless eyes.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: His clothing was out of line with Cheyenne but it suited a universally air-conditioned Washington, where Security, despite everything, was still centered.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Breckenridge flushed and said, "There's no doubt about it."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "You people know all about Them, I suppose," said Lynn and was unable to keep a trace of sarcasm out of his tone.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He was not particularly aware of his use of a slightly-stressed pronoun in his reference to the enemy, the equivalent of capitalization in print. It was a cultural habit of this generation and the one preceding.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: No one said the "East," or the "Reds" or the "Soviets" or the "Russians" any more. That would have been too confusing, since some of Them weren't of the East, weren't Reds, Soviets, and especially not Russians.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It was much simpler to say We and They, and much more precise.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Travelers had frequently reported that They did the same in reverse. Over there, They were "We" (in the appropriate language) and We were "They."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Scarcely anyone gave thought to such things any more. It was all quite comfortable and casual.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: There was no hatred, even. At the beginning, it had been called a Cold War.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Now it was only a game, almost a good-natured game, with unspoken rules and a kind of decency about it.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn said, abruptly, "Why should They want to disturb the situation?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He rose and stood staring at a wall-map of the world, split into two regions with faint edgings of color. An irregular portion on the left of the map was edged in a mild green.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: A smaller, but just as irregular, portion on the right of the map was bordered in a washed-out pink. We and They.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: The map hadn't changed much in a century. The loss of Formosa and the gain of East Germany some eighty years before had been the last territorial switch of importance.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: There had been another change, though, that was significant enough and that was in the colors. Two generations before, Their territory had been a brooding, bloody red, Ours a pure and undefiled white.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Now there was a neutrality about the colors. Lynn had seen Their maps and it was the same on Their side.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "They wouldn't do it," he said.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "They are doing it," said Breckenridge, "and you had better accustom yourself to the fact. Of course, sir, I realize that it isn't pleasant to think that they may be that far ahead of us in robotics."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: His eyes remained as guileless as ever, but the hidden knife-edges of the words plunged deep, and Lynn quivered at the impact.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Of course, that would account for why the Chief of Robotics learned of this so late and through a Security officer at that. He had lost caste in the eyes of the Government; if Robotics had really failed in the struggle, Lynn could expect no political mercy.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn said wearily, "Even if what you say is true, they're not far ahead of us. We could build humanoid robots."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Have we, sir?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Yes. As a matter of fact, we have built a few models for experimental purposes."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "They were doing so ten years ago. They've made ten years' progress since."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn was disturbed. He wondered if his incredulity concerning the whole business were really the result of wounded pride and fear for his job and reputation.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He was embarrassed by the possibility that this might be so, and yet he was forced into defense.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He said, "Look, young man, the stalemate between Them and Us was never perfect in every detail, you know. They have always been ahead in one facet or another and We in some other facet or another.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: If They're ahead of us right now in robotics, it's because They've placed a greater proportion of Their effort into robotics than We have. And that means that some other branch of endeavor has received a greater share of Our efforts than it has of Theirs.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It would mean We're ahead in force-field research or in hyper-atomics, perhaps."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn felt distressed at his own statement that the stalemate wasn't perfect. It was true enough, but that was the one great danger threatening the world.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: The world depended on the stalemate being as perfect as possible. If the small unevennesses that always existed over-balanced too far in one direction or the other--
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Almost at the beginning of what had been the Cold War, both sides had developed thermonuclear weapons, and war became unthinkable. Competition switched from the military to the economic and psychological and had stayed there ever since.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: But always there was the driving effort on each side to break the stalemate, to develop a parry for every possible thrust, to develop a thrust that could not be parried in time--something that would make war possible again.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: And that was not because either side wanted war so desperately, but because both were afraid that the other side would make the crucial discovery first.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: For a hundred years each side had kept the struggle even. And in the process, peace had been maintained for a hundred years while, as byproducts of the continuously intensive research, force-fields had been produced and solar energy and insect control and robots.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Each side was making a beginning in the understanding of mentalics, which was the name given to the biochemistry and biophysics of thought. Each side had its outposts on the Moon and on Mars.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Mankind was advancing in giant strides under forced draft.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It was even necessary for both sides to be as decent and humane as possible among themselves, lest through cruelty and tyranny, friends be made for the other side.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It couldn't be that the stalemate would now be broken and that there would be war.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn said, "I want to consult one of my men. I want his opinion."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Is he trustworthy?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn looked disgusted. "Good Lord, what man in Robotics has not been investigated and cleared to death by your people? Yes, I vouch for him.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: If you can't trust a man like Humphrey Carl Laszlo, then we're in no position to face the kind of attack you say They are launching, no matter what else we do."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "I've heard of Laszlo," said Breckenridge.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Good. Does he pass?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Yes."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Then, I'll have him in and we'll find out what he thinks about the possibility that robots could invade the U. S. A."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Not exactly," said Breckenridge, softly. "You still don't accept the full truth.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Find out what he thinks about the fact that robots have _already_ invaded the U. S. A."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Laszlo was the grandson of a Hungarian who had broken through what had then been called the Iron Curtain, and he had a comfortable above-suspicion feeling about himself because of it.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He was thick-set and balding with a pugnacious look graven forever on his snub face, but his accent was clear Harvard and he was almost excessively soft-spoken.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: To Lynn, who was conscious that after years of administration he was no longer expert in the various phases of modern robotics, Laszlo was a comforting receptacle for complete knowledge. Lynn felt better because of the man's mere presence.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn said, "What do you think?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: A scowl twisted Laszlo's face ferociously. "That They're that far ahead of us. Completely incredible.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It would mean They've produced humanoids that could not be told from humans at close quarters. It would mean a considerable advance in robo-mentalics."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "You're personally involved," said Breckenridge, coldly. "Leaving professional pride out of account, exactly why is it impossible that They be ahead of Us?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Laszlo shrugged. "I assure you that I'm well acquainted with Their literature on robotics. I know approximately where They are."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "You know approximately where They want you to _think_ They are, is what you really mean," corrected Breckenridge. "Have you ever visited the other side?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "I haven't," said Laszlo, shortly.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Nor you, Dr. Lynn?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn said, "No, I haven't, either."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Breckenridge said, "Has any robotics man visited the other side in twenty-five years?" He asked the question with a kind of confidence that indicated he knew the answer.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: For a matter of seconds, the atmosphere was heavy with thought.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Discomfort crossed Laszlo's broad face. He said, "As a matter of fact, They haven't held any conferences on robotics in a long time."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "In twenty-five years," said Breckenridge. "Isn't that significant?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Maybe," said Laszlo, reluctantly. "Something else bothers me, though.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: None of Them have ever come to Our conferences on robotics. None that I can remember."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Were They invited?" asked Breckenridge.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn, staring and worried, interposed quickly, "Of course."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Breckenridge said, "Do They refuse attendance to any other types of scientific conferences We hold?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "I don't know," said Laszlo. He was pacing the floor now. "I haven't heard of any cases.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Have you, Chief?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "No," said Lynn.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Breckenridge said, "Wouldn't you say it was as though They didn't want to be put in the position of having to return any such invitation? Or as though They were afraid one of Their men might talk too much?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: That was exactly how it seemed, and Lynn felt a helpless conviction that Security's story was true after all steal over him.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Why else had there been no contact between sides on robotics? There had been a cross-fertilizing trickle of researchers moving in both directions on a strictly one-for-one basis for years, dating back to the days of Eisenhower and Khrushchev.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: There were a great many good motives for that: an honest appreciation of the supra-national character of science; impulses of friendliness that are hard to wipe out completely in the individual human being; the desire to be exposed to a fresh and interesting outlook and to have your own slightly-stale notions greeted by others as fresh and interesting.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: The governments themselves were anxious that this continue. There was always the obvious thought that by learning all you could and telling as little as you could, your own side would gain by the exchange.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: But not in the case of robotics. Not there.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Such a little thing to carry conviction. And a thing, moreover, they had known all along.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn thought, darkly: We've taken the complacent way out.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Because the other side had done nothing publicly on robotics, it had been tempting to sit back smugly and be comfortable in the assurance of superiority. Why hadn't it seemed possible, even likely, that They were hiding superior cards, a trump hand, for the proper time?
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Laszlo said, shakenly, "What do we do?" It was obvious that the same line of thought had carried the same conviction to him.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Do?" parroted Lynn. It was hard to think right now of anything but of the complete horror that came with conviction.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: There were ten humanoid robots somewhere in the United States, each one carrying a fragment of a TC bomb.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: TC! The race for sheer horror in bomb-ery had ended there. TC! Total Conversion!
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: The sun was no longer a synonym one could use. Total conversion made the sun a penny candle.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Ten humanoids, each completely harmless in separation, could, by the simple act of coming together, exceed critical mass and--
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn rose to his feet heavily, the dark pouches under his eyes, which ordinarily lent his ugly face a look of savage foreboding, more prominent than ever. "It's going to be up to us to figure out ways and means of telling a humanoid from a human and then finding the humanoids."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "How quickly?" muttered Laszlo.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Not later than five minutes before they get together," barked Lynn, "and I don't know when that will be."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Breckenridge nodded. "I'm glad you're with us now, sir. I'm to bring you back to Washington for conference, you know."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn raised his eyebrows. "All right."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He wondered if, had he delayed longer in being convinced, he might not have been replaced forthwith--if some other Chief of the Bureau of Robotics might not be conferring in Washington. He suddenly wished earnestly that exactly that had come to pass.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: The First Presidential Assistant was there, the Secretary of Science, the Secretary of Security, Lynn himself, and Breckenridge. Five of them sitting about a table in the dungeons of an underground fortress near Washington.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Presidential Assistant Jeffreys was an impressive man, handsome in a white-haired and just-a-trifle-jowly fashion, solid, thoughtful and as unobtrusive, politically, as a Presidential Assistant ought to be.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: He spoke incisively. "There are three questions that face us as I see it. First, when are the humanoids going to get together? Second, where are they going to get together?
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Third, how do we stop them before they get together?"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Secretary of Science Amberley nodded convulsively at that. He had been Dean of Northwestern Engineering before his appointment.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: He was thin, sharp-featured and noticeably edgy. His forefinger traced slow circles on the table.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "As far as _when_ they'll get together," he said. "I suppose it's definite that it won't be for some time."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "Why do you say that?" asked Lynn, sharply.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "They've been in the U. S. at least a month already. So Security says."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Lynn turned automatically to look at Breckenridge, and Secretary of Security Macalaster intercepted the glance. Macalaster said, "The information is reliable. Don't let Breckenridge's apparent youth fool you, Dr. Lynn.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: That's part of his value to us. Actually, he's 34 and has been with the department for ten years.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: He has been in Moscow for nearly a year and without him, none of this terrible danger would be known to us. As it is, we have most of the details."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "Not the crucial ones," said Lynn.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Macalaster of Security smiled frostily. His heavy chin and close-set eyes were well-known to the public but almost nothing else about him was.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: He said, "We are all finitely human, Dr. Lynn. Agent Breckenridge has done a great deal."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Presidential Assistant Jeffreys cut in. "Let us say we have a certain amount of time. If action at the instant were necessary, it would have happened before this. It seems likely that they are waiting for a specific time.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: If we knew the place, perhaps the time would become self-evident.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "If they are going to TC a target, they will want to cripple us as much as possible, so it would seem that a major city would have to be it. In any case, a major metropolis is the only target worth a TC bomb.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: I think there are four possibilities: Washington, as the administrative center; New York, as the financial center; and Detroit and Pittsburgh as the two chief industrial centers."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Macalaster of Security said, "I vote for New York. Administration and industry have both been decentralized to the point where the destruction of any one particular city won't prevent instant retaliation."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "Then why New York?" asked Amberly of Science, perhaps more sharply than he intended. "Finance has been decentralized as well."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "A question of morale. It may be they intend to destroy our will to resist, to induce surrender by the sheer horror of the first blow. The greatest destruction of human life would be in the New York Metropolitan area--"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "Pretty cold-blooded," muttered Lynn.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "I know," said Macalaster of Security, "but they're capable of it, if they thought it would mean final victory at a stroke. Wouldn't we--"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Presidential Assistant Jeffreys brushed back his white hair. "Let's assume the worst. Let's assume that New York will be destroyed some time during the winter, preferably immediately after a serious blizzard when communications are at their worst and the disruption of utilities and food supplies in fringe areas will be most serious in their effect.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Now, how do we stop them?"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Amberley of Science could only say, "Finding ten men in two hundred and twenty million is an awfully small needle in an awfully large haystack."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Jeffreys shook his head. "You have it wrong. Ten humanoids among two hundred twenty million humans."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "No difference," said Amberley of Science. "We don't know that a humanoid can be differentiated from a human at sight. Probably not." He looked at Lynn.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: They all did.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Lynn said heavily, "We in Cheyenne couldn't make one that would pass as human in the daylight."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "But They can," said Macalaster of Security, "and not only physically. We're sure of that.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: They've advanced mentalic procedures to the point where they can reel off the micro-electronic pattern of the brain and focus it on the positronic pathways of the robot."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Lynn stared. "Are you implying that they can create the replica of a human being complete with personality and memory?"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "I do."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "Of specific human beings?"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "That's right."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "Is this also based on Agent Breckenridge's findings?"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "Yes. The evidence can't be disputed."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Lynn bent his head in thought for a moment. Then he said, "Then ten men in the United States are not men but humanoids. But the originals would have had to be available to them.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: They couldn't be Orientals, who would be too easy to spot, so they would have to be East Europeans. How would they be introduced into this country, then?
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: With the radar network over the entire world border as tight as a drum, how could They introduce any individual, human or humanoid, without our knowing it?"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Macalaster of Security said, "It can be done. There are certain legitimate seepages across the border. Businessmen, pilots, even tourists.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: They're watched, of course, on both sides. Still ten of them might have been kidnapped and used as models for humanoids.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: The humanoids would then be sent back in their place. Since we wouldn't expect such a substitution, it would pass us by.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: If they were Americans to begin with, there would be no difficulty in their getting into this country. It's as simple as that."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "And even their friends and family could not tell the difference?"
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: "We must assume so. Believe me, we've been waiting for any report that might imply sudden attacks of amnesia or troublesome changes in personality. We've checked on thousands."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Amberley of Science stared at his finger-tips. "I think ordinary measures won't work. The attack must come from the Bureau of Robotics and I depend on the chief of that bureau."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Again eyes turned sharply, expectantly, on Lynn.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: Lynn felt bitterness rise. It seemed to him that this was what the conference came to and was intended for. Nothing that had been said had not been said before.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: He was sure of that. There was no solution to the problem, no pregnant suggestion.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: It was a device for the record, a device on the part of men who gravely feared defeat and who wished the responsibility for it placed clearly and unequivocally on someone else. And yet there was justice in it.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: It was in robotics that We had fallen short. And Lynn was not Lynn merely.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: He was Lynn of Robotics and the responsibility had to be his.
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: He said, "I will do what I can."
scene_description: indoors, underground bunker, conference table, stark lighting

segment_text: He spent a wakeful night and there was a haggardness about both body and soul when he sought and attained another interview with Presidential Assistant Jeffreys the next morning.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Breckenridge was there, and though Lynn would have preferred a private conference, he could see the justice in the situation. It was obvious that Breckenridge had attained enormous influence with the government as a result of his successful Intelligence work.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Well, why not?
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Lynn said, "Sir, I am considering the possibility that we are hopping uselessly to enemy piping."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "In what way?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "I'm sure that however impatient the public may grow at times, and however legislators sometimes find it expedient to talk, the government at least recognizes the world stalemate to be beneficial. They must recognize it also.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Ten humanoids with one TC bomb is a trivial way of breaking the stalemate."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "The destruction of fifteen million human beings is scarcely trivial."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "It is from the world power standpoint. It would not so demoralize us as to make us surrender or so cripple us as to convince us we could not win.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: There would just be the same old planetary death-war that both sides have avoided so long and so successfully. And all They would have accomplished is to force us to fight minus one city.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: It's not enough."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "What do you suggest?" said Jeffreys, coldly. "That They do not have ten humanoids in our country? That there is not a TC bomb waiting to get together?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "I'll agree that those things are here, but perhaps for some reason greater than just mid-winter bomb-madness."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Such as?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "It may be that the physical destruction resulting from the humanoids getting together is not the worst thing that can happen to us. What about the moral and intellectual destruction that comes of their being here at all?
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: With all due respect to Agent Breckenridge, what if They _intended_ for us to find out about the humanoids; what if the humanoids are never supposed to get together, but merely to remain separate in order to give us something to worry about."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Why?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Tell me this. What measures have already been taken against the humanoids? I suppose that Security is going through the files of all citizens who have ever been across the border or close enough to it to make kidnapping possible.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: I know, since Macalaster mentioned it yesterday, that they are following up suspicious psychiatric cases. What else?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Jeffreys said, "Small X-ray devices are being installed in key places in the large cities. In the mass arenas, for instance--"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Where ten humanoids might slip in among a hundred thousand spectators of a football game or an air-polo match?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Exactly."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "And concert halls and churches?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "We must start somewhere. We can't do it all at once."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Particularly when panic must be avoided?" said Lynn. "Isn't that so?
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: It wouldn't do to have the public realize that at any unpredictable moment, some unpredictable city and its human contents would suddenly cease to exist."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "I suppose that's obvious. What are you driving at?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Lynn said strenuously, "That a growing fraction of our national effort will be diverted entirely into the nasty problem of what Amberley called finding a very small needle in a very large haystack. We'll be chasing our tails madly, while They increase their research lead to the point where we find we can no longer catch up; when we must surrender without the chance even of snapping our fingers in retaliation.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Consider further that this news will leak out as more and more people become involved in our counter-measures and more and more people begin to guess what we're doing. Then what? The panic might do us more harm than any one TC bomb."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: The Presidential Assistant said, irritably, "In Heaven's name, man, what do you suggest we do, then?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Nothing," said Lynn. "Call their bluff. Live as we have lived and gamble that They won't dare break the stalemate for the sake of a one-bomb headstart."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Impossible!" said Jeffreys. "Completely impossible. The welfare of all of Us is very largely in my hands, and doing nothing is the one thing I cannot do.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: I agree with you, perhaps, that X-ray machines at sports arenas are a kind of skin-deep measure that won't be effective, but it has to be done so that people, in the aftermath, do not come to the bitter conclusion that we tossed our country away for the sake of a subtle line of reasoning that encouraged do-nothingism. In fact, our counter-gambit will be active indeed."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "In what way?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Presidential Assistant Jeffreys looked at Breckenridge. The young Security officer, hitherto calmly silent, said, "It's no use talking about a possible future break in the stalemate when the stalemate is broken now.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: It doesn't matter whether these humanoids explode or do not. Maybe they _are_ only a bait to divert us, as you say.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: But the fact remains that we are a quarter of a century behind in robotics, and that may be fatal. What other advances in robotics will there be to surprise us if war does start?
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: The only answer is to divert our entire force immediately, _now_, into a crash program of robotics research, and the first problem is to find the humanoids. Call it an exercise in robotics, if you will, or call it the prevention of the death of fifteen million men, women and children."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Lynn shook his head, helplessly, "You _can't_. You'd be playing into their hands. They want us lured into the one blind alley while they're free to advance in all other directions."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Jeffreys said, impatiently, "That's your guess. Breckenridge has made his suggestion through channels and the government has approved, and we will begin with an all-Science conference."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "All-Science?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Breckenridge said, "We have listed every important scientist of every branch of natural science. They'll all be at Cheyenne.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: There will be only one point on the agenda: How to advance robotics. The major specific sub-heading under that will be: How to develop a receiving device for the electromagnetic fields of the cerebral cortex that will be sufficiently delicate to distinguish between a protoplasmic human brain and a positronic humanoid brain."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Jeffreys said, "We had hoped you would be willing to be in charge of the conference."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "I was not consulted in this."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: "Obviously time was short, sir. Do you agree to be in charge?"
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Lynn smiled briefly. It was a matter of responsibility again. The responsibility must be clearly that of Lynn of Robotics.
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: He had the feeling it would be Breckenridge who would really be in charge. But what could he do?
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: He said, "I agree."
scene_description: indoors, government office, desk, official decor

segment_text: Breckenridge and Lynn returned together to Cheyenne, where that evening Laszlo listened with a sullen mistrust to Lynn's description of coming events.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Laszlo said, "While you were gone, Chief, I've started putting five experimental models of humanoid structure through the testing procedures. Our men are on a twelve-hour day, with three shifts overlapping.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: If we've got to arrange a conference, we're going to be crowded and red-taped out of everything. Work will come to a halt."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Breckenridge said, "That will be only temporary. You will gain more than you lose."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Laszlo scowled. "A bunch of astrophysicists and geochemists around won't help a damn toward robotics."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Views from specialists of other fields may be helpful."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "Are you sure? How do we know that there _is_ any way of detecting brain waves or that, even if we can, there is a way of differentiating human and humanoid by wave pattern. Who set up the project, anyway?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "I did," said Breckenridge.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "_You_ did? Are you a robotics man?"
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: The young Security agent said, calmly, "I have studied robotics."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "That's not the same thing."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "I've had access to text-material dealing with Russian robotics--in Russian. Top-secret material well in advance of anything you have here."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn said, ruefully, "He has us there, Laszlo."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: "It was on the basis of that material," Breckenridge went on, "that I suggested this particular line of investigation. It is reasonably certain that in copying off the electromagnetic pattern of a specific human mind into a specific positronic brain, a perfectly exact duplicate cannot be made.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: For one thing, the most complicated positronic brain small enough to fit into a human-sized skull is hundreds of times less complex than the human brain. It can't pick up all the overtones, therefore, and there must be some way to take advantage of that fact."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Laszlo looked impressed despite himself and Lynn smiled grimly. It was easy to resent Breckenridge and the coming intrusion of several hundred scientists of non-robotics specialties, but the problem itself was an intriguing one.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: There was that consolation, at least.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It came to him quietly.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Lynn found he had nothing to do but sit in his office alone, with an executive position that had grown merely titular. Perhaps that helped.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It gave him time to think, to picture the creative scientists of half the world converging on Cheyenne.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It was Breckenridge who, with cool efficiency, was handling the details of preparation. There had been a kind of confidence in the way he said, "Let's get together and we'll lick Them."
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: Let's get together.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: It came to Lynn so quietly that anyone watching Lynn at that moment might have seen his eyes blink slowly twice--but surely nothing more.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He did what he had to do with a whirling detachment that kept him calm when he felt that, by all rights, he ought to be going mad.
scene_description: indoors, office, desk, wall-map

segment_text: He sought out Breckenridge in the other's improvised quarters.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Breckenridge was alone and frowning. "Is anything wrong, sir?"
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Lynn said, wearily, "Everything's right, I think. I've invoked martial law."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "What!"
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "As chief of a division I can do so if I am of the opinion the situation warrants it. Over my division, I can then be dictator. Chalk up one for the beauties of decentralization."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "You will rescind that order immediately." Breckenridge took a step forward. "When Washington hears this, you will be ruined."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "I'm ruined anyway. Do you think I don't realize that I've been set up for the role of the greatest villain in American history: the man who let Them break the stalemate. I have nothing to lose--and perhaps a great deal to gain."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: He laughed a little wildly, "What a target the Division of Robotics will be, eh, Breckenridge? Only a few thousand men to be killed by a TC bomb capable of wiping out three hundred square miles in one micro-second.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: But five hundred of those men would be our greatest scientists. We would be in the peculiar position of having to fight a war with our brains shot out, or surrendering.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: I think we'd surrender."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "But this is impossible. Lynn, do you hear me? Do you understand? How could the humanoids pass our security provisions? How could they get together?"
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "But they _are_ getting together! We're helping them to do so. We're ordering them to do so.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Our scientists visit the other side, Breckenridge. They visit Them regularly. You made a point of how strange it was that no one in robotics did.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Well, ten of those scientists are still there and in their place, ten humanoids are converging on Cheyenne."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "That's a ridiculous guess."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "I think it's a good one, Breckenridge. But it wouldn't work unless we knew humanoids were in America so that we would call the conference in the first place. Quite a coincidence that you brought the news of the humanoids _and_ suggested the conference _and_ suggested the agenda _and_ are running the show and know exactly which scientists were invited.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Did you make sure the right ten were included?"
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "Dr. Lynn!" cried Breckenridge in outrage. He poised to rush forward.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Lynn said, "Don't move. I've got a blaster here. We'll just wait for the scientists to get here one by one.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: One by one we'll X-ray them. One by one, we'll monitor them for radioactivity.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: No two will get together without being checked, and if all five hundred are clear, I'll give you my blaster and surrender to you. Only I think we'll find the ten humanoids.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Sit down, Breckenridge."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: They both sat.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Lynn said, "We wait. When I'm tired, Laszlo will spell me. We wait."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Professor Manuelo Jiminez of the Institute of Higher Studies of Buenos Aires exploded while the stratospheric jet on which he traveled was three miles above the Amazon Valley. It was a simple chemical explosion but it was enough to destroy the plane.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Dr. Herman Liebowitz of M. I. T. exploded in a monorail, killing twenty people and injuring a hundred others.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: In similar manner, Dr. Auguste Marin of L'Institut NuclÃ©onique of Montreal and seven others died at various stages of their journey to Cheyenne.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Laszlo hurtled in, pale-faced and stammering, with the first news of it. It had only been two hours that Lynn had sat there, facing Breckenridge, blaster in hand.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Laszlo said, "I thought you were nuts, Chief, but you were right. They _were_ humanoids. They _had_ to be."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: He turned to stare with hate-filled eyes at Breckenridge. "Only they were warned. _He_ warned them, and now there won't be one left intact. Not one to study."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "God!" cried Lynn and in a frenzy of haste thrust his blaster out toward Breckenridge and fired. The Security man's neck vanished; the torso fell; the head dropped, thudded against the floor and rolled crookedly.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Lynn moaned, "I didn't understand, I thought he was a traitor. Nothing more."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: And Laszlo stood immobile, mouth open, for the moment incapable of speech.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Lynn said, wildly. "Sure, he warned them. But how could he do so while sitting in that chair unless he were equipped with built-in radio"
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: transmission? Don't you see it? Breckenridge had been in Moscow. The real Breckenridge is still there. Oh my God, there were _eleven_ of them."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Laszlo managed a hoarse squeak. "Why didn't _he_ explode?"
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: "He was hanging on, I suppose, to make sure the others had received his message and were safely destroyed. Lord, Lord, when you brought the news and I realized the truth, I couldn't shoot fast enough. God knows by how few seconds I may have beaten him to it."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Laszlo said, shakily, "At least, we'll have one to study."
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: He bent and put his fingers on the sticky fluid trickling out of the mangled remains at the neck end of the headless body.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office

segment_text: Not blood, but high-grade machine oil.
scene_description: indoors, improvised quarters, sparse furnishing, temporary office
